Exclusive: Rubio urges SEC to block Shein IPO unless China operating risk disclosedRepublican Senator Marco Rubio asked the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to block Shein’s bid to list publicly in New York unless the e-tailer makes additional disclosures about its business operations and "the serious risks of doing business" in China. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 17:03:22 GMT XKFENEI3AFN3BL7PJ6SSOZ3AKE https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/rubio-urges-sec-block-shein-ipo-unless-china-operating-risk-disclosure-2024-02-15/Katherine Masters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Ford CEO open to working with rivals to compete with ChinaFord Chief Executive Jim Farley said on Thursday the automaker is reworking its electric vehicle strategy to compete with Chinese rivals, and opened the door to collaboration with other automakers to cut EV battery costs. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 15:12:49 GMT DHKTHKEV3BILVMI6IZ5U6QLEVQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/ford-ceo-open-working-with-rivals-compete-with-china-2024-02-15/Joseph White, Nathan Gomes可持续发展可持续财务与报告
Amid Rome spat, Stellantis CEO says Italy plants have a futureStellantis CEO Carlos Tavares said on Thursday the carmaker will need all of its Italian factories to hit its long-term production goal there, in conciliatory remarks that may ease tensions between the Fiat car maker and Rome. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 13:28:00 GMT DZOBY7GSZ5IXJEB3NZ7FWPA5II https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/amid-rome-spat-stellantis-ceo-says-italy-plants-have-future-2024-02-15/Giulio Piovaccari商业汽车与交通
Joo's brace moves Ulsan to verge of Asian Champions League quartersUlsan Hyundai put one foot in the quarter-finals of the Asian Champions League on Thursday as the South Korean champions handed Japanese second division side Ventforet Kofu a 3-0 defeat at Ulsan Munsu Stadium. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 12:15:09 GMT U77SJJUKRVOFXHRXN7NLNDTOJY https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/joos-brace-moves-ulsan-verge-asian-champions-league-quarters-2024-02-15/Michael Church运动的足球
Cold snap expected in China as millions return from Lunar New Year tripsA cold snap is forecast to sweep across many parts of China from this weekend, with temperatures falling by up to 20 degrees Celsius as millions return from Lunar New Year trips, the national observatory said on Thursday. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 11:56:23 GMT GOL4LET5VRJ3HITZP3VUGWQHIE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/cold-snap-expected-china-millions-return-lunar-new-year-trips-2024-02-15/Reuters世界中国
